tasks.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task
tasks.topic: In some countries, small town-centre shops are going out of business because people tend to drive to large out-of-town stores. As a result, people without cars have limited access to out-of-town stores, and it may result in an increase in the use of cars. Do you think the disadvantages of this change outweigh its advantages?
requirements: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
